name: Tokarev Pistol [Christmas]
skill: Deals 3283/4023 DMG to the enemy with the lowest HP.

additional_data.description: This spirit of a perfectly preserved pistol is no stranger to frontline action. With a weapon in her hand, this girl puts the "miss" in "missile." Since forming an alliance with Sola, she has helped with many assignments. She discovered that, for some reason, whenever she's around Master, her sudden personality changes stop, and so she has started hanging out with Master a lot. She's becoming more and more frightened, however, by the looks Sola-who doesn't want Master stolen away-gives her.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Shadow over Christmas" Event: Clear Chapter 3
◦ "Shadow over Christmas" Event: Exchange for 1000 Tiny Present
◦ "Shadow over Christmas" Event: Get a First Half Ranking of 2501-6000.
◦ "Shadow over Christmas" Event: Get a Total Ranking of 5001-7500.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Slightly increases the drop rate of Tiny Present during the "Shadow over Christmas" event.

main: "Things are so much better when I'm with you."
limit_break: "When we're together, Master, I feel like everything's going to be all right."
